title: ! Need Face ID !
content:
If someone can identify these typefaces I will drink another IPA in your honor. Its a homebrew, come on. Yeeee haaaw!

comments.content: The »Alembic« is similar to some Latin-typefaces and looks like it would come from the freeware department also.
